Review Title: I hope to stay in this hotel again
Review Text: Thank you very much for Mr. Rami's advice.  &also thank you to the hotel for the Quran they gave me when I was handed over to the room.I came there with mystudent & we had a very good experience.& now, as I am writing this msg, my student has migrated to Dubai🥺

2024.11/2、土曜日、19:00、気温28℃。
メディテラネオ(Mediterraneo)の
ブッフェディナー利用。時間フリー。
ドレスコード、スマートカジュアル。
スマートカジュアル=綺麗めカジュアル。
スニーカー、デニムは、NG。
せっかくなのでドレスアップしました。
ドバイファウンテンと夜景を堪能しながらのディナーが出来ました。
テラス席からのファウンテンは、全体的に見れてすごく良かったです♪
お料理は、前菜エリア、メインエリア、デザートエリアに分かれてるので取りやすくどれも美味しく頂きました♪
スタッフの接客、特にレセプションのrami。雰囲気、清潔感、ローケーション。
全てにおいて非常に良かったです。
素敵な夜を過ごすことが出来ました。
また、素直に利用したいと感じました。
rami、私を助けてくれてありがとうございました。

Review Title: Stayed at this hotel after being out at the Dubai Opera.
Review Text: Excellent location service and room. The staff are really good. The room and view superb.  The only thing that lets the hotel down is checking in and out.  They leave people waiting whilst they go and show another guest to their room and totally unattended on the front desk.  If they could sort this they would be offering the perfect service. Breakfast was lovely and a lot of choice.  Would highly recommend

The best hotel in the world, is my home. There, everything works perfectly. And the reason for that, is even the small details that only I can say because is very personal, every friend from housekeeping is also Zain, Rahul, Gayan, Nazeer, front desk Dina, Sonia, Gracer, Lounge is Begimai, restaurants  Leo, Paola, Sudan, Billy, doorman, spa is Swostika, Hanif, Rosa, and pool area, also Dev, Kiran, Samir, Yagea, Kasun Siva just to say some of the staff for now, otherwise this gets too much, but next time I do. With love, Aman.

Review Title: An Unforgettable Stay, Made Exceptional by Rami at Armani Hotel, Dubai
Review Text:
An Unforgettable Stay, Made Exceptional by Rami at Armani Hotel, Dubai

Our stay at the Armani Hotel in Dubai was nothing short of magical, but what truly made it stand out was the incredible kindness and compassion we received from one remarkable individual—Rami. He wasn’t just a staff member; he became a beacon of support and care for my family during a time we needed it the most.

While we were staying at the hotel, we unexpectedly fell ill. Rami’s immediate and heartfelt response to our situation was beyond anything we could have imagined. He didn’t just help us with routine hospitality—he treated us like family, perhaps even better than family. From the moment he realized we were unwell, he made it his personal mission to ensure our comfort and recovery.

Rami arranged a late check-out so we could rest as long as we needed, gave us breakfast to ensure we had nourishment, and kept checking in on us as if we were his own. When we needed medical help, Rami swiftly arranged for a doctor to visit our room. Not only that, but he personally saw to it that our prescriptions were delivered directly to us from the pharmacy. His attention to detail, care, and genuine concern turned what could have been a stressful time into one of comfort and reassurance.

Rami’s kindness went far beyond professionalism. He was warm, attentive, and truly empathetic—qualities that are hard to come by. His presence alone made us feel safe and cared for, and he left an indelible mark on our hearts. It’s not often that you meet someone in hospitality who feels like a lifelong friend, but Rami is exactly that kind of person.

While the Armani Hotel is a stunning testament to luxury and elegance, it’s the people, especially Rami, who make it a home away from home. He didn’t just meet expectations; he exceeded them in ways we couldn’t have imagined. If there’s one thing we will always remember from our time in Dubai, it’s the generosity and kindness of Rami.

We will forever be grateful for his compassion during our stay and will return to the Armani Hotel not just for its beauty, but for the wonderful people like him who make it truly exceptional.

I’ve traveled all over the world, have never experienced this type of hospitality. God bless Rami and the Armani hotel! 100 out of 10 stars !

Review Text: I been to the spa to relax my body and mind , it was amazing spa with amazing experience, therapist Bagus and Asani was so professional, they are taking care of us till end of the treatment, I highly recommend to visit and experience this place, definitely will come back

Let’s start from checkinn .it was super duper slow had to wait for more than 30mins jst to called by the reception guy even though he was very nice but waiting for more than 30mins doesn’t give u any pleasure .we had to ask for water ourselves and nobody bothered for welcome drinks untill we asked for it .the room was smoking that’s understandable but it was stinking like hell.asked for coffee pods but the request got ignored nd nobody bothered to come up with it .asked for cutlery and some plates nd the reply was we have to wait for atleast 20-30mins as the staff was busy .i mean come on guys we paid for high end services and flawless experience from Armani but this property is a let down .not recommending to anyone .disappointed 
Disappointed disappointed.

Mohit nagpal 
Room no 621

I spent a night at the Armani hotel Dubai  only because I had previously stayed at the Armani Milan, and I believe the hotels in this area are more luxurious and of a higher standard than in Europe. The hotel is in a good,  location, cozy hotel.
The staff was friendly , and special thanks to the Mr. Pramod kumar who upgraded my room to a suite with a fountain view, and also thanks to Mr. Anwesh. 
The room (suite) was very ordinary; the amenities are below average; they were better in Milan! there was no iron in the room, and I expected it to be more impressive.
I loved the relaxant smell of the place.
The hotel has direct access to Dubai Mall. 
The breakfast was wonderful and delicious.
The hotel price is very high. Overall, it’s a nice hotel, and I might stay there again if the price were lower.

The room Nice and clean  good view   Housekeeping service excellent  totelly I enjoy  my stay  Staff nazeer Very friendly  profession defnintly I will bring m’y friends 
Lobby Very Nice arrange Flowers and room amenities  especially soap and shower gel

Review Text:
The hotel is absolutely amazing! The bed is so comfortable, the room is so elegant, the view from the room is something else and the staff are absolutely amazing! It’s a perfect hotel as location and facilities. The Spa services is one of the top. 

Special thanks to Gracer, he makes my stay super smooth and memorable.
